start.text: All stations, this is the Captain. Set General Quarters. Commence combat operations.
TAO reports weapons hot, systems green. Ready to engage on your order.
Battle stations manned and ready. Standing by for weapons release.
Ship is at General Quarters, combat systems fully operational. Awaiting your command.
All stations report ready for action. Combat watch closed up.
All stations, Actual. Set condition one throughout the ship. This is not a drill.
TAO, Captain. I have the conn. Weapons posture to free, safeties off.
Combat, Bridge. Confirm hostile intent and stand by for weapons release.
General Quarters, General Quarters. All hands man your battle stations.
We have tasking. Spin up all systems and stand by for further.
Contacts flagged hostile per ROE. Proceeding as briefed.
All stations report manned and ready. Authenticate and stand by.
Bridge has tactical authority. Weapons tight until my command.

start_boss.text: High-value target designated ALPHA. All weapons train on that contact. Priority engagement.
Capital ship contact bearing, classified high-threat. Weapons tight until PID confirmed.
Flag-level hostile confirmed. Bringing the full broadside to bear.
That's the primary threat. All batteries, this is our fight.
TAO, designate that contact ALPHA-ONE. All stations, this is a priority tasking.
Confirm visual on high-value target. Weapons free on ALPHA, acknowledge.
That signature matches our briefing. Someone upstairs wants this one gone.
Capital-class hostile, positively identified. We have authorization to prosecute.
All stations, be advised - this target is flagged at the directorate level. No mistakes.
HVT on scope. Adjust firing solutions, I want overlapping coverage on that hull.

engaged.text: Weapons free, weapons free. Engaging hostile contacts.
Batteries released. Commence fire, commence fire.
Range closing. Opening fire with all available weapons.
Positive ID, hostile. You are cleared hot. Shoot.
All stations, we are engaged. Weapons free, I say again, weapons free.
Fox three, fox three. Missiles away, tracking true.
TAO, shift fire to the next contact. Keep the pressure on.
Guns, guns, guns. Kinetics on target.
Contact the bearing, engaged. Splash when able.
Copy, hostile is maneuvering. Maintain solution and continue to prosecute.
Firing for effect. Report impacts as observed.
We have a good track. Continue engagement until otherwise directed.
Keep it professional. Shoot what you can hit, hit what you shoot.
Tally, bandits. Engaging the near contact first.

pursuing.text: Target is running. Pursuing at flank speed, maintain firing solution.
Hostile attempting to break contact. Negative, closing to knife-fight range.
Pursuit course. Do not let them disengage.
They're turning away. Press the attack, keep them in the envelope.
Contact is retrograde. Increase speed, do not let them clear the battlespace.
TAO, they're running. Pursue and prosecute until otherwise directed.
Helm, all ahead flank. We have authorization to chase this one down.
Hostile is attempting to break contact. Negative. Maintain pursuit.
They want out. That's not in our tasking. Close the distance.
Stay on them. Someone wants gun camera footage of this one burning.
Do not lose that contact. We were told to make this thorough.

running.text: Executing tactical withdrawal. Screening units cover our pullout.
Combat effectiveness reduced. Disengaging per doctrine.
We're taking heavy fire. Break contact, reform at rally point.
Captain orders tactical retrograde. All units acknowledge withdrawal.
All stations, break contact. Execute withdrawal to designated rally point.
Tactical situation has deteriorated. Recommend immediate disengagement.
This engagement is no longer within acceptable parameters. Pull out.
Helm, come about. We're preserving the asset for another day.
Command has been advised of our situation. Disengaging now.
We'll get another shot. Disengage and regroup.
This one isn't worth the hull. All stations, break off.

hull_90.text: Minor hull hit, port quarter. Damage negligible, continuing the engagement.
Took a round, armor held. No impact on combat capability.
Light damage forward. DC parties respond, maintain fire.
Hit confirmed, superficial. Weapons and propulsion nominal.
Damage control, minor hit starboard side. Assess and report.
That one grazed us. All stations, maintain current operations.
Armor took the brunt. Ship remains combat effective.
We're scratched, not stopped. Keep firing.
Light contact, no casualties. Press the attack.

hull_50.text: Hull integrity fifty percent. We're hurt but still in the fight.
Multiple hits amidships. Damage control, prioritize magazines and VLS.
Heavy damage. Requesting screening support to remain engaged.
Fifty percent structure remaining. Guns still answering bells.
Significant structural damage. Continuing offensive operations.
Damage control, multiple compartments reporting flooding. Contain it.
We've lost redundancy in several systems. Rerouting through backups.
TAO, report combat effectiveness... Copy, we're still in this.
Hull's compromised but the mission isn't. Continue engagement.
Took heavy hits. Adjusting posture to compensate.
Command is aware of our status. Proceed until otherwise directed.
She's hurt. We've worked with worse.

hull_30.text: Critical hull damage! Multiple frames failing. Prepare to abandon ship if ordered!
Losing integrity fast! All damage control parties, maximum effort!
Hull failing in multiple sections! Brace for impact, brace!
We're coming apart! All hands to escape pods, stand by!
Hull failing - We're coming apart! Be ready to abandon ship!
All stations, this is not a drill. Prepare for possible abandonment.
Structural failure imminent. DC, give me everything you've got.
We are in extremis. All hands, stand by for further orders.
She's breaking up. Stay calm, stay professional. We've trained for this.
Multiple critical failures. Begin emergency protocols, await my command.
Catastrophic damage sustained. Maintain stations until ordered otherwise.
This is the Captain. Stay at your posts. We're not done yet.

need_help.text: Any unit this net, this is $shipNameNoPrefix, heavily engaged, multiple hostiles, require immediate assistance.
Taking heavy fire from multiple vectors. Request relief force now.
This is $shipNameNoPrefix, under concentrated fire, need support at this time.
We are in contact, outnumbered. Any friendly unit, vector to my position.
Any Alliance unit this net, request immediate fire support at my position.
We are engaged and require backup. Acknowledge and vector.
Multiple contacts, single ship. Requesting any available asset.
This is $shipNameNoPrefix. We need support or we're not making it out.
Priority request - any friendly unit, we are combat ineffective without support.
Going defensive. Request immediate assistance from any station.

retreat.text: All units, execute immediate withdrawal to phase line Delta. Acknowledge.
Break contact. Tactical withdrawal, cover each other.
Fleet order: disengage and reform. Cease fire, maximize distance.
We're pulling out. Screen the withdrawal, then follow.
All stations this net, disengage and proceed to rally point. Acknowledge.
Cease fire, cease fire. Execute tactical withdrawal on my mark.
This engagement is terminated. All units RTB.
Command has authorized withdrawal. Break contact and regroup.
We've done what we can here. Preserve your ships.
Disengage by sections. Screen each other on the way out.

out_of_missiles.text: VLS cells empty. Switching to five-inch and energy batteries.
Missile expenditure complete. Continuing with guns, close the range.
Ordnance expended. Transitioning to gun engagement.
No missiles remaining. Going to knives.
TAO reports Winchester on all missile systems. Guns only.
All tubes dry. Shifting to direct fire weapons.
Missile loadout expended. Close to gun range.
We're Winchester. Someone make a note for the debrief.
Out of birds. Continue prosecution with available weapons.
VLS shows empty across the board. Guns will have to do.

overload.text: Flux critical! Emergency vent - weapons temporarily offline!
Overload cascade! Forced vent in three… two…
Capacitors spiking - dropping shields to vent!
Flux overload! All hands brace for vent!
Engineering reports flux critical. Venting now.
All stations, brace for emergency vent. Shields cycling.
Capacitor overload. We'll be dark for a moment, stay calm.
Flux grid at capacity. Forced vent in progress.
Going defensive while we vent. Helm, evasive.
Thermal spike across the grid. Emergency protocols initiated.

death.text: Reactor criticality… abandon ship… abandon ship…
She's breaking up… give 'em hell for us…
This is $shipNameNoPrefix… we are lost… avenge us…
Core breach… it's been an honor serving with you…
Catastrophic damage! Reactor scram, abandon ship, abandon ship!
All hands, abandon ship. Abandon ship. This is the Captain... it's been an honor.
Reactor containment failure. May God have mercy... abandon ship.
Core breach imminent. Get to the pods. That's an order.
$shipNameNoPrefix, final transmission. Tell the Office... mission complete.
She's gone. All hands, get clear... get clear...
This is $shipNameNoPrefix... we did our duty... signing off...

victory.text: Hostiles destroyed. Secure from general quarters.
Battlespace is ours. Standing by for further orders.
Enemy force neutralized. Resume patrol posture.
All contacts splashed. Secure from General Quarters.
TAO confirms battlespace clear. Good shooting, everyone.
Hostile force eliminated. Resume standard operations.
Tasking complete. Standing by for follow-on orders.
Mission accomplished. The Office will be pleased.
Area sanitized. Proceeding to next objective.
That's the last of them. Log it and move on.

victory_boss.text: High-value target destroyed. Major objective complete.
Capital ship kill confirmed. Damn fine shooting.
Primary threat eliminated. Log that one for the wardroom tonight.
Flag-level hostile sunk. The fleet owes this crew.
ALPHA is down. Confirming kill on the high-value target.
HVT destroyed. Someone upstairs is going to be very happy.
Primary objective eliminated. I want gun camera footage preserved.
Splash one capital. That's one for the directorate's wall.
Target neutralized as directed. Excellent work, all stations.
The briefing said this one mattered. Now it doesn't. Well done.
